condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

title.narrative: Integrated Results and Resources Framework (IRRF)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.5.A

description.narrative: Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Whole of society

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.5.B

description.narrative: Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Women's groups

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.2.2.5.C

description.narrative: Country has adopted and implemented, with UNDP assistance, legal and regulatory frameworks that enable civil society to function in the public sphere and contribute to sustainable development: Youth groups

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.2.3.C.2

description.narrative: Country has an improved enabling environment for expansion of decent work and livelihoods: Direct support of livelihood in: Private sector (If YES, please provide Number of livelihoods supported)

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.2.3.A.1

description.narrative: Country has an improved enabling environment for expansion of decent work and livelihoods: Policy, legal, regulatory and institutional frameworks

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.1.3.A

description.narrative: Country has data collection/analysis mechanisms providing disaggregated data to monitor progress towards the SDGs: Conventional data collection methods (e.g. surveys)

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.1.1.A

description.narrative: Country has development plans and budgets that integrate international agreements across the whole-of-government: 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.1.1.B

description.narrative: Country has development plans and budgets that integrate international agreements across the whole-of-government: Paris Agreement

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.1.1.1

description.narrative: National and sub-national governments have improved capacities to plan, budget, manage and monitor basic services

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.2.3.B.2

description.narrative: Country has an improved enabling environment for expansion of decent work and livelihoods: Direct creation of employment in: Private sector (If YES, please provide Number of employment created)

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.5.1.1.C.1

description.narrative: Number and proportion of households benefitting from clean, affordable and sustainable energy access: Rural households

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.5.1.1.C.3

description.narrative: Number and proportion of households benefitting from clean, affordable and sustainable energy access: Proportion rural households with access

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.5.1.1.C.2

description.narrative: Number and proportion of households benefitting from clean, affordable and sustainable energy access: Rural households with access
